name: Poker: Texas & Omaha Hold'em
overview: Your Handheld Casino Experience No matter if it's your first time playing poker, or you’re a seasoned veteran, with this game you will sharpen your skills and experience the thrill of winning big at the poker table! You can play with AI or up to 6 players in local multiplayer mode. There are five difficulty levels, and lots of customization features: - Custom Blinds - Round time limit - Shop with over 20 different tables, floors, and table materials - 10 card artwork styles to choose from - Player avatars … and more! Check it out and enjoy a crash course in probability, psychology, and game theory.
